project_files.name: .gitignore
project_files.content:
# See http://help.github.com/ignore-files/ for more about ignoring files...
# compiled output
/dist
/tmp
/out-tsc

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Directory for instrumented libs generated by jscoverage/JSCover
lib-cov

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage

# nyc test coverage
.nyc_output

# Grunt intermediate storage (http://gruntjs.com/creating-plugins#storing-task-files)
.grunt

# Bower dependency directory (https://bower.io/)
bower_components

# node-waf configuration
.lock-wscript

# IDEs and editors
.idea
.project
.classpath
.c9/
*.launch
.settings/
*.sublime-workspace

# IDE - VSCode
.vscode/*
!.vscode/settings.json
!.vscode/tasks.json
!.vscode/launch.json
!.vscode/extensions.json

# misc
.sass-cache
connect.lock
typings

# Logs
logs
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Dependency directories
node_modules/
jspm_packages/

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional eslint cache
.eslintcache

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history

# Output of 'npm pack'
*.tgz

# Yarn Integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# dotenv environment variables file
.env

# next.js build output
.next

# Lerna
lerna-debug.log

# System Files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

project_files.name: app.js
bin/www
public/stylesheets/style.css
routes/index.js
services/notionService.js
views/documentation.ejs
project_files.content:
‚Üê Back to Home

<%= title %>

Documentation generated for databases on page: <%= pageId %>

<% databases.forEach(db => { %>

Database: <%= db.title %>

<% if (db.description) { %>

<%= db.description %>

<% } %>

Properties & Schema

<% db.properties.forEach(prop => { %> <% }); %>
Property Name Type Dependencies & Relations Notes (Template)
<%= prop.name %> <%= prop.type %> <% if (prop.type === 'formula') { %>
Formula: 
<%= prop.formula %>
<% if (prop.dependencies.length > 0) { %> Depends on:
    <% prop.dependencies.forEach(dep => { %>
  • <%= dep %>
    • <% }); %>
<% } %>
<% } else if (prop.type === 'relation' && prop.relation) { %>
Relation to: <%= prop.relation.database_title || prop.relation.database_id %>
<% } else if (prop.type === 'rollup' && prop.rollup) { %>
Rollup via: <%= prop.rollup.relation_property_name %>
Of Property: <%= prop.rollup.rollup_property_name %>
Using: <%= prop.rollup.function %>
<% } else { %> N/A <% } %>
<% }); %>
×

project_files.name: views/error.ejs
project_files.content:
<%= message %>

<%= error.status %>

<%= error.stack %>

project_files.name: views/index.ejs
project_files.content:
<%= title %>

Enter the ID of your Notion page to generate documentation for its databases.

<% if (typeof error !== 'undefined' && error) { %>
<%= error %>
<% } %>

How to get your Page ID:

  1. Open your Notion page in a web browser.
  2. The URL will look like: https://www.notion.so/Your-Page-Title-1f2a3b4c5d6e7f8a9b0c1d2e3f4a5b6c
  3. The Page ID is the long string of characters at the end of the URL.
  4. Make sure you have shared this page with your Notion Integration.

project_files.name: views/layout.ejs
project_files.content: <%- body %>
